column4: pidgin's yahoo protocol stopped working 3 days back due to server updates by yahoo, and pidgin has already released an updated package. is there a way to request an updated package for inclusion in our repositories?
you can get the deb here if you don't want to wait.. : http://news.softpedia.com/news/How-to-Fix-Yahoo-problem-in-Pidgin-114754.shtml
bastidrazor: i checked that article and figured out that "pidgin-developers" is doing the packaging. Any idea when will the package make it to the upstream?
